trans-unit.source: about_Jobs
trans-unit.target: about_Jobs

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: About Jobs
trans-unit.target: 關於工作

trans-unit.source: about_Jobs
trans-unit.target: about_Jobs

trans-unit.source: about_Jobs
trans-unit.target: about_Jobs

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 簡短描述

trans-unit.source: Provides information about how Windows PowerShell background jobs run a command or expression in the background without interacting with the current session.
trans-unit.target: 提供如何 Windows PowerShell 背景工作執行的命令或運算式在背景中沒有與目前工作階段互動的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 詳細描述

trans-unit.source: This topic explains how to run background jobs in Windows PowerShell on a local computer.
trans-unit.target: 本主題說明如何在 Windows PowerShell 中執行背景工作，在本機電腦上。

trans-unit.source: For information about running background jobs on remote computers, see about_Remote_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 如需在遠端電腦上執行背景工作的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Remote_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: When you start a background job, the command prompt returns immediately, even if the job takes an extended time to complete.
trans-unit.target: 當您啟動背景工作時，命令提示字元會立即傳回，即使此工作所需的一段的時間才能完成。

trans-unit.source: You can continue to work in the session without interruption while the job runs.
trans-unit.target: 工作執行時，您可以在工作階段中繼續工作，而不需中斷。

trans-unit.source: THE JOB CMDLETS
trans-unit.target: 工作 CMDLET

trans-unit.source: Start-Job Starts a background job on a local computer.
trans-unit.target: 在本機電腦上，啟動工作可啟動背景工作。

trans-unit.source: Get-Job Gets the background jobs that were started in the current session.
trans-unit.target: Get 作業取得目前工作階段中啟動的背景工作。

trans-unit.source: Receive-Job Gets the results of background jobs.
trans-unit.target: 取得接收工作之背景工作的結果。

trans-unit.source: Stop-Job Stops a background job.
trans-unit.target: 停止工作會停止背景工作。

trans-unit.source: Wait-Job Suppresses the command prompt until one or all jobs are complete.
trans-unit.target: Wait-job 會抑制命令提示字元，直到一個或所有工作都已完成。

trans-unit.source: Remove-Job Deletes a background job.
trans-unit.target: 移除作業會刪除背景工作。

trans-unit.source: Invoke-Command The AsJob parameter runs any command as a background job on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦上，叫用命令 AsJob 參數會執行任何命令當作背景工作。

trans-unit.source: You can also use Invoke-Command to run any job command remotely, including a Start-Job command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用叫用命令至遠端電腦上，執行任何工作命令包括 Start-job 命令。

trans-unit.source: HOW TO START A JOB ON THE LOCAL COMPUTER
trans-unit.target: 如何在本機電腦上啟動工作

trans-unit.source: To start a background job on the local computer, use the Start-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要在本機電腦上啟動背景工作，使用 Start-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To write a Start-Job command, enclose the command that the job runs in braces ( { } ).
trans-unit.target: 若要撰寫 Start-job 命令，括住在執行工作的大括號 （{}） 中的命令。

trans-unit.source: Use the ScriptBlock parameter to specify the command.
trans-unit.target: 指定的命令使用 ScriptBlock 參數。

trans-unit.source: The following command starts a background job that runs a Get-Process command on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會啟動本機電腦執行 Get-process 命令的背景工作。

trans-unit.source: Start-Job -ScriptBlock {Get-Process}
trans-unit.target: 開始工作-ScriptBlock {Get-process}

trans-unit.source: The Start-Job command returns an object that represents the job.
trans-unit.target: Start-job 命令會傳回代表工作的物件。

trans-unit.source: The job object contains useful information about the job, but it does not contain the job results.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件包含工作的相關實用資訊，但是不包含工作結果。

trans-unit.source: Save the job object in a variable, and then use it with the other Job cmdlets to manage the background job.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件儲存在變數中，並接著使用它的其他工作 cmdlet 來管理背景工作。

trans-unit.source: The following command starts a job object and saves the resulting job object in the $job variable.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會啟動工作物件，並將產生的工作物件儲存在 $job 變數。

trans-unit.source: $job = Start-Job -ScriptBlock {Get-Process}
trans-unit.target: $job = Start-job ScriptBlock {Get-process}

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Get-Job cmdlet to get objects that represent the jobs started in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 Get-job cmdlet 取得代表目前的工作階段中啟動工作的物件。

trans-unit.source: Get-Job returns the same job object that Start-Job returns.
trans-unit.target: Get 作業會傳回相同的工作物件開始作業傳回。

trans-unit.source: GETTING JOB OBJECTS
trans-unit.target: 取得工作物件

trans-unit.source: To get object that represent the background jobs that were started in the current session, use the Get-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得物件，代表目前的工作階段中啟動的背景工作，請使用 Get-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Without parameters, Get-Job returns all of the jobs that were started in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有參數，Get 作業會傳回所有目前工作階段中啟動的工作。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command gets the jobs in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列命令會取得目前工作階段中的工作。

trans-unit.source: PS C:>Get-Job
trans-unit.target: PS C: > Get 作業

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: 識別碼名稱 PSJobTypeName 狀態 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 1 Job1 BackgroundJob Running True localhost Get-Process
trans-unit.target: 1 Job1 BackgroundJob 執行，則為 True localhost Get 程序

trans-unit.source: You can also save the job object in a variable and use it to represent the job in a later command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以工作物件儲存在變數中，並使用它來代表更新的命令中的工作。

trans-unit.source: The following command gets the job with ID 1 and saves it in the $job variable.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會取得識別碼為 1 的作業，並將它儲存在 $job 變數。

trans-unit.source: $job = Get-Job -Id 1
trans-unit.target: $job = 取得作業的識別碼為 1

trans-unit.source: The job object contains the state of the job, which indicates whether the job has finished.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件包含的作業，表示是否已完成工作的狀態。

trans-unit.source: A finished job has a state of "Complete" or "Failed".
trans-unit.target: 完成的工作具有 「 完成 」 或 「 失敗 」 狀態。

trans-unit.source: A job might also be blocked or running.
trans-unit.target: 工作可能也會封鎖或並未執行。

trans-unit.source: Get-Job
trans-unit.target: 取得工作

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: 識別碼名稱 PSJobTypeName 狀態 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 1 Job1 BackgroundJob Complete True localhost Get-Process
trans-unit.target: 1 Job1 BackgroundJob 完成，則為 True localhost Get 程序

trans-unit.source: GETTING THE RESULTS OF A JOB
trans-unit.target: 取得工作的結果

trans-unit.source: When you run a background job, the results do not appear immediately.
trans-unit.target: 當您執行背景工作時，不會立即顯示結果。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the Start-Job cmdlet returns a job object that represents the job, but it does not contain the results.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，Start-job cmdlet 會傳回工作物件，表示該作業，但它不包含結果。

trans-unit.source: To get the results of a background job, use the Receive-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得背景工作的結果，請使用 Receive-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Receive-Job cmdlet to get the results of the job.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令使用 Receive-job cmdlet 取得工作的結果。

trans-unit.source: It uses a job object saved in the $job variable to identify the job.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用工作物件儲存在 $job 變數識別這項作業。

trans-unit.source: Receive-Job -Job $job
trans-unit.target: 接收工作-工作 $job

trans-unit.source: The Receive-Job cmdlet returns the results of the job.
trans-unit.target: Receive-job cmdlet 會傳回工作的結果。

trans-unit.source: Handles NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU(s) Id ProcessName
trans-unit.target: 處理 NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU 識別碼 ProcessName

trans-unit.source: You can also save the results of a job in a variable.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在變數中儲存工作的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following command saves the results of the job in the $job variable to the $results variable.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會將工作的結果儲存至 $results 變數 $job 變數。

trans-unit.source: $results = Receive-Job -Job $job
trans-unit.target: $results = 接收作業的作業 $job

trans-unit.source: And, you can save the results of the job in a file by using the redirection operator (>) or the Out-File cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 而且，您也可以使用重新導向運算子 (>) 檔案中儲存工作的結果或 Out-file 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the redirection operator to save the results of the job in the $job variable in the Results.txt file.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會使用重新導向運算子，將工作結果儲存在 $job 變數 Results.txt 檔案中。

trans-unit.source: Receive-Job -Job $job > results.txt
trans-unit.target: 接收工作-工作 $job > results.txt

trans-unit.source: GETTING AND KEEPING PARTIAL JOB RESULTS
trans-unit.target: 取得及保留部分作業的結果

trans-unit.source: The Receive-Job cmdlet gets the results of a background job.
trans-unit.target: Receive-job cmdlet 取得背景工作的結果。

trans-unit.source: If the job is complete, Receive-Job gets all job results.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作已完成，接收作業會取得所有工作結果。

trans-unit.source: If the job is still running, Receive-Job gets the results that have been generated thus far.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業仍在執行中，接收作業會取得到目前為止已經產生的結果。

trans-unit.source: You can run Receive-Job commands again to get the remaining results.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行接收作業命令一次，以取得其餘的結果。

trans-unit.source: When Receive-Job returns results, by default, it deletes those results from the cache where job results are stored.
trans-unit.target: 當接收作業傳回的結果，根據預設時，從儲存作業結果的快取中刪除這些結果。

trans-unit.source: If you run another Receive-Job command, you get only the results that are not yet received.
trans-unit.target: 如果您執行另一個接收作業命令時，就會在尚未收到的結果。

trans-unit.source: The following commands show the results of Receive-Job commands run before the job is complete.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令可顯示工作完成之前，執行接收作業命令的結果。

trans-unit.source: C:\PS> Receive-Job -Job $job
trans-unit.target: C:\PS> > 接收工作-工作 $job

trans-unit.source: Handles NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU(s) Id ProcessName
trans-unit.target: 處理 NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU 識別碼 ProcessName

trans-unit.source: C:\PS> Receive-Job -Job $job
trans-unit.target: C:\PS> > 接收工作-工作 $job

trans-unit.source: Handles NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU(s) Id ProcessName
trans-unit.target: 處理 NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU 識別碼 ProcessName

trans-unit.source: To prevent Receive-Job from deleting the job results that it has returned, use the Keep parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止刪除工作結果，但傳回接收作業，請使用 Keep 參數。

trans-unit.source: As a result, Receive-Job returns all of the results that have been generated until that time.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，接收作業會傳回所有結果之前，所產生。

trans-unit.source: The following commands show the effect of using the Keep parameter on a job that is not yet complete.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會顯示尚未完成的工作上使用 Keep 參數的效果。

trans-unit.source: C:\PS> Receive-Job -Job $job -Keep
trans-unit.target: C:\PS> > 接收工作-工作 $job-保留

trans-unit.source: Handles NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU(s) Id ProcessName
trans-unit.target: 處理 NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU 識別碼 ProcessName

trans-unit.source: C:\PS> Receive-Job -Job $job -Keep
trans-unit.target: C:\PS> > 接收工作-工作 $job-保留

trans-unit.source: Handles NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU(s) Id ProcessName
trans-unit.target: 處理 NPM(K) PM(K) WS(K) VM(M) CPU 識別碼 ProcessName

trans-unit.source: WAITING FOR THE RESULTS
trans-unit.target: 等候的結果

trans-unit.source: If you run a command that takes a long time to complete, you can use the properties of the job object to determine when the job is complete.
trans-unit.target: 如果您執行需要很長的時間才能完成的命令，您可以使用工作物件的屬性來判斷何時該工作已完成。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Get-Job object to get all of the background jobs in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會使用 Get 工作物件，取得目前工作階段中所有的背景工作。

trans-unit.source: Get-Job
trans-unit.target: 取得工作

trans-unit.source: The results appear in a table.
trans-unit.target: 結果會出現在資料表中。

trans-unit.source: The status of the job appears in the State column.
trans-unit.target: 工作狀態會出現在 [狀態] 欄中。

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: 識別碼名稱 PSJobTypeName 狀態 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 1 Job1 BackgroundJob Complete True localhost Get-Process 2 Job2 BackgroundJob Running True localhost Get-EventLog -Log Syst... 3 Job3 BackgroundJob Complete True localhost dir -Path C:\* -Recurse
trans-unit.target: 1 Job1 BackgroundJob 完成，則為 True localhost Get-process 2 Job2 BackgroundJob 執行，則為 True localhost Get-eventlog-記錄 Syst....3 Job3 BackgroundJob 完成，則為 True 的 localhost dir-Path c:\* -Recurse

trans-unit.source: In this case, the State property reveals that Job 2 is still running.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，State 屬性會顯示工作 2 仍在執行。

trans-unit.source: If you were to use the Receive-Job cmdlet to get the job results now, the results would be incomplete.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要使用 Receive-job cmdlet 來立即取得工作結果，則結果會不完整。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Receive-Job cmdlet repeatedly to get all of the results.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重複使用 Receive-job cmdlet 取得所有結果。

trans-unit.source: By default, each time you use it, you get only the results that were not already received, but you can use the Keep parameter of the Receive-Job cmdlet to retain the results, even though they were already received.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，每次使用它，就會取得未已收到，結果，但您可以使用 Receive-job cmdlet 的保留參數來保留結果，即使已經收到。

trans-unit.source: You can write the partial results to a file and then append newer results as they arrive or you can wait and check the state of the job later.
trans-unit.target: 您可以寫入檔案的部分結果，並到達時，或等到，檢查稍後的工作狀態，然後附加較新的結果。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Wait parameter of the Receive-Job cmdlet, which does not return the command prompt until the job is complete and all results are available.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Receive-job 指令程式，不會傳回命令提示字元，直到工作完成，且有可用的所有結果 Wait 參數。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Wait-Job cmdlet to wait for any or all of the results of the job.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 Wait-job cmdlet 等待任何或所有工作的結果。

trans-unit.source: Wait-Job lets you wait for a particular job, for all jobs, or for any of the jobs to be completed.
trans-unit.target: 等候工作可讓您等候特定作業的所有工作，或任何工作完成。

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Wait-Job cmdlet to wait for a job with
trans-unit.target: 下列命令使用 Wait-job cmdlet 等待工作

trans-unit.source: ID 10.
trans-unit.target: 識別碼 10。

trans-unit.source: Wait-Job -ID 10
trans-unit.target: 等候工作 ID 10

trans-unit.source: As a result, the Windows PowerShell prompt is suppressed until the job is completed.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，Windows PowerShell 提示字元會受到抑制，直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: You can also wait for a predetermined period of time.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以等待一段預先定義的一段時間。

trans-unit.source: This command uses the Timeout parameter to limit the wait to 120 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用限制為 120 秒等候逾時參數。

trans-unit.source: When the time expires, the command prompt returns, but the job continues to run in the background.
trans-unit.target: 時間時，命令提示字元，但是作業會繼續在背景中執行。

trans-unit.source: Wait-Job -ID 10 -Timeout 120
trans-unit.target: 等候工作 ID 10-Timeout 120

trans-unit.source: STOPPING A JOB
trans-unit.target: 停止工作

trans-unit.source: To stop a background job, use the Stop-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止背景工作，請使用 Stop-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The following command starts a job to get every entry in the System event log.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會啟動工作來取得系統事件記錄檔中的每個項目。

trans-unit.source: It saves the job object in the $job variable.
trans-unit.target: 它會將工作物件儲存在 $job 變數。

trans-unit.source: $job = Start-Job -ScriptBlock {Get-EventLog -Log System}
trans-unit.target: $job = Start-job ScriptBlock {Get-eventlog-記錄檔系統}

trans-unit.source: The following command stops the job.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會停止工作。

trans-unit.source: It uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the job in the $job variable to Stop-Job.
trans-unit.target: 它使用管線運算子 (|) $job 變數中的工作傳送至 Stop-job。

trans-unit.source: $job | Stop-Job
trans-unit.target: $job |停止工作

trans-unit.source: DELETING A JOB
trans-unit.target: 刪除工作

trans-unit.source: To delete a background job, use the Remove-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除的背景工作，請使用 Remove-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The following command deletes the job in the $job variable.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會刪除 $job 變數中的工作。

trans-unit.source: Remove-Job -Job $job
trans-unit.target: 移除工作-工作 $job

trans-unit.source: INVESTIGATING A FAILED JOB
trans-unit.target: 調查失敗的工作

trans-unit.source: To find out why a job failed, use the Reason subproperty of the job object.
trans-unit.target: 若要找出工作失敗的原因，使用工作物件的原因子屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following command starts a job without the required credentials.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會啟動工作沒有必要的認證。

trans-unit.source: It saves the job object in the $job variable.
trans-unit.target: 它會將工作物件儲存在 $job 變數。

trans-unit.source: $job = Start-Job -ScriptBlock {New-Item -Path HKLM:\Software\MyCompany}
trans-unit.target: $job = Start-job ScriptBlock {新增項目-路徑 HKLM:\Software\MyCompany}

trans-unit.source: Id Name PSJobTypeName State HasMoreData Location Command
trans-unit.target: 識別碼名稱 PSJobTypeName 狀態 HasMoreData 位置命令

trans-unit.source: 1 Job1 BackgroundJob Failed False localhost New-Item -Path HKLM:\S...
trans-unit.target: 1 Job1 BackgroundJob 失敗，則為 False localhost 新增項目-路徑 HKLM:\S...

trans-unit.source: The following command uses the Reason property to find the error that caused the job to fail.
trans-unit.target: 下列命令會使用原因屬性，以找出錯誤導致作業失敗。

trans-unit.source: $job.ChildJobs[0].JobStateInfo.Reason
trans-unit.target: $job。ChildJobs [0]。JobStateInfo.Reason

trans-unit.source: In this case, the job failed because the remote computer required explicit credentials to run the command.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，工作失敗，因為遠端電腦必須有明確的認證來執行命令。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Reason property is:
trans-unit.target: 原因屬性的值是︰

trans-unit.source: Connecting to remote server failed with the following error message : Access is denied.
trans-unit.target: 連接到遠端伺服器失敗，並出現下列錯誤訊息︰ 拒絕存取。

trans-unit.source: SEE ALSO
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.source: about_Remote_Jobs about_Job_Details about_Remote about_PSSessions Start-Job Get-Job Receive-Job Stop-Job Wait-Job Remove-Job Invoke-Command
trans-unit.target: about_Remote_Jobs about_Job_Details about_Remote about_PSSessions Start-job Get 作業接收作業停止工作等候工作移除作業叫用命令
